results.title: Long-term effects of simvastatin in familial dysbetalipoproteinaemia.
results.text_hl: The long-term effects (66 weeks) of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (40 mg in one or two doses per day), an inhibitor of @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@HMG CoA-reductase@@@, were evaluated in 12 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Epileptic_Syndromes @DISEASE_MESH:D000073376 @@@familial dysbetalipoproteinaemia@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Osteogenesis_imperfecta_type_3</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536044 @@@type III hyperlipoproteinaemia@@@).

citations.NLM: Stuyt PM, Mol MJ, Stalenhoef AF. Long-term effects of simvastatin in familial dysbetalipoproteinaemia. J Intern Med. 1991 Aug;230(2):151-5. PMID: 1865167
citations.BibTeX: @article{1865167, title={Long-term effects of simvastatin in familial dysbetalipoproteinaemia.}, author={Stuyt PM and Mol MJ and Stalenhoef AF}, journal={J Intern Med}, volume={230}, number={2}, pages={151-5}}
